short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Export Twitter threads to PDF or copy to clipboard.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Twitter Thread Exporter  allows you to easily save and share complete Twitter Thread. Here's what it does :
1. Export Twitter Threads to PDF:
You can convert entire Twitter threads into well-formatted PDF documents with a single click.
2. Copy Thread Content to Clipboard:
The extension allows you to quickly copy the entire text content of a Twitter thread to your clipboard.
3. Preserves Media Content:
When exporting to PDF, the extension includes images and links to videos.

You should install this extension if you:
1. Frequently need to save or share Twitter threads.
2. Want an easy way to archive important Twitter threads.
3. Prefer reading long threads in a more readable format (PDF) or offline.

By installing the Twitter Thread Exporter, making it easier to capture, save, and share the wealth of information found in Twitter threads.
